block.p: Carolyn Willis and Louis Schwartz are to be married this afternoon by Rabbi Dennis Ross at the Manhattan Penthouse. .

The bride, 34, is the director of advertising and promotion for the Bantam Dell Publishing Group in New York. She graduated from Johns Hopkins University. Her parents, Jane H. Willis and Dr. Robert Willis, live in Tenafly, N.J., where her mother is a personal property appraiser. The bride's father is a psychiatrist in private practice in New York.
Carolyn Willis and Louis Schwartz are to be married this afternoon by Rabbi Dennis Ross at the Manhattan Penthouse. .

The bride, 34, is the director of advertising and promotion for the Bantam Dell Publishing Group in New York. She graduated from Johns Hopkins University. Her parents, Jane H. Willis and Dr. Robert Willis, live in Tenafly, N.J., where her mother is a personal property appraiser. The bride's father is a psychiatrist in private practice in New York.

The bridegroom, 37, is an e-commerce and Internet consultant in New York. From 1995 to 1997, he was the chief lending officer at DialogBank, which was a bank in Moscow. He graduated from Georgetown University. His parents, Iris and Seymour Schwartz, live in Pittsfield, Mass., where his father, now retired, was a managing partner in Adelson & Company, an accounting firm. The bridegroom's mother, also retired, was a teaching consultant at the DeSisto School, a boarding school Stockbridge, Mass.
